findings.details: Added consistent line-height + min-height to blog entry excerpts to reduce visual jumping on mobile and stabilize card heights.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan found no placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts.
SEO tags present in layouts and page front matter includes description/keywords for key pages.
Blog excerpts are truncated and wrapped for readability; added consistent height for cleaner scanning.

recommendations: When network access is available, run a live external link check for recent news posts.
Consider adding a short meta description to any new posts that lack one to keep SERP snippets consistent.
